channel.title: Missile Defense on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Missile Defense on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump’s Golden Dome will cost 10 to 100 times more than the Manhattan Project
item.description: In nuclear era, it has proven cheaper to build offensive weapons than play defense.

item.title: Lawmaker: Trump’s Golden Dome will end the madness, and that’s not a good thing
item.description: “I don’t want to gamble on which major city or two we lose in a scenario like that.”

item.title: What exactly is Golden Dome? This Space Force general owes Trump an answer.
item.description: “Basically, I’ve been given 60 days to come up with the objective architecture.”
